Summary: UFO stopped above my tanker when I was fueling a locomotive.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi was fueling a locomotive at gavin yard, minot, nd. fueling a locomotive takes about 20-30 min. there is a airport nearby about 4 miles. i saw what look like a plane flying real slow over gavin yard and also flying a little low. there were no blinking lights under the object, just a bright white looked like a landing light for a plane. the height of the object was about one and a half telephone poles high. i was wearing a headlamp on my hard hat and i decided to flash my light at it to signal it just to humor myself. the object changed direction and headed in my direction. the object stopped right above my tanker(semi-tractor) the object made no sound had no wings, no smell that i could remember nor wind. the object was black and cylinder in shape about forty feet in length with a white light pointing down and a little faint red light at the end of it. i got on my radio to see if anyone else could see it but everyone else was inside the tower, as soon as i got off the radio it moved to the south, i watched it for about two minutes and it went slow maybe about 20mph, i looked at my fuel gauge on the locomotive and then looked back to see it and it was gone! the wind was blowing from the west\south west at 11:15 pm july 3rd, 2010.
